titles.title: Free Internet Filing Act
A bill to provide for direct access to electronic tax return filing, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S4212-4213)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
3/29/2007--Introduced.
Free Internet Filing Act - Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to enable individual taxpayers to file their income tax returns directly through the Internal Revenue Service website without the use of any intermediary.
